articles.title: Trump opens door to sales of version of Nvidia's next-gen AI chips in China
articles.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday suggested he might allow Nvidia to sell a scaled-down version of its next-generation advanced GPU chip in China, despite deep-seated fears in Washington that China could harness American artificial intelligence capabilities to supercharge its military.
articles.translated_title: Trump opens door to sales of version of Nvidia's next-gen AI chips in China
articles.translated_summary: U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday suggested he might allow Nvidia to sell a scaled-down version of its next-generation advanced GPU chip in China, despite deep-seated fears in Washington that China could harness American artificial intelligence capabilities to supercharge its military.

articles.title: Micron raises forecasts as AI boosts memory chip demand
articles.summary: Micron Technology on Monday raised its forecast for fourth-quarter revenue and adjusted profit, banking on surging demand for its memory chips used in artificial intelligence infrastructure, sending its shares up about 3%.
articles.translated_title: Micron raises forecasts as AI boosts memory chip demand
articles.translated_summary: Micron Technology on Monday raised its forecast for fourth-quarter revenue and adjusted profit, banking on surging demand for its memory chips used in artificial intelligence infrastructure, sending its shares up about 3%.

articles.title: 'Alien: Earth' star Timothy Olyphant: Scary AI tech is on our doorstep
articles.summary: Timothy Olyphant told UPI playing Kirsh on "Alien: Earth" made him realize just how fast artificial intelligence technology is advancing in the real world.
articles.translated_title: 'Alien: Earth' star Timothy Olyphant: Scary AI tech is on our doorstep
articles.translated_summary: Timothy Olyphant told UPI playing Kirsh on "Alien: Earth" made him realize just how fast artificial intelligence technology is advancing in the real world.

articles.title: Medicare Update: Lawmakers Sound Alarm About Major Change to Program
articles.summary: The new model incorporates artificial intelligence to help make decisions and is being tested in six states beginning in January.
articles.translated_title: Medicare Update: Lawmakers Sound Alarm About Major Change to Program

articles.title: Hollywood Rocked by Amazon-Backed AI Tool, Showrunner, that Allows Viewers to Create Their Own Shows
articles.summary: Filmmakers, educators, and other entertainment industry professionals are reacting in alarm at a new Amazon-backed tool that will allow viewers to create their own TV shows using an artificial intelligence system called Showrunner.
articles.translated_title: Hollywood Rocked by Amazon-Backed AI Tool, Showrunner, that Allows Viewers to Create Their Own Shows
articles.translated_summary: Filmmakers, educators, and other entertainment industry professionals are reacting in alarm at a new Amazon-backed tool that will allow viewers to create their own TV shows using an artificial intelligence system called Showrunner.

articles.title: SoftBank’s billion-dollar AI bet: Masayoshi Son’s mission to build artificial superintelligence
articles.summary: Masayoshi Son is once again swinging for the fences. The billionaire founder of SoftBank believes his company will sit at the center of the next big shift in technology—a shift he says will arrive within a decade. articles.title: Micron Technology raises quarterly results forecast on AI-driven demand
articles.summary: Micron Technology on Monday raised its forecast for fourth-quarter revenue and adjusted profit, due to surging demand for its memory chips used in artificial intelligence infrastructure, sending its shares up 5% before the bell.
articles.translated_title: Micron Technology raises quarterly results forecast on AI-driven demand

articles.title: To Aid Economy, Trump Must Restore Faith in Institutions
articles.summary: If President Donald Trump succeeds in unleashing a new era of energy abundance and securing America's leadership in artificial intelligence, the economic gains will be profound.
articles.translated_title: To Aid Economy, Trump Must Restore Faith in Institutions
articles.translated_summary: If President Donald Trump succeeds in unleashing a new era of energy abundance and securing America's leadership in artificial intelligence, the economic gains will be profound.

articles.title: Indonesia eyes 'sovereign AI fund' to drive development, document shows
articles.summary: Authorities overseeing the development of artificial intelligence in Indonesia have proposed a "sovereign AI fund" to finance the archipelago's ambitions to become a regional hub for the fast-growing technology, a government document showed.
articles.translated_title: Indonesia eyes 'sovereign AI fund' to drive development, document shows

articles.title: Why A.I. Should Make Parents Rethink Posting Photos of Their Children Online
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence apps generating fake nudes, amid other privacy concerns, make “sharenting” far riskier than it was just a few years ago.
